name: Pull Yourself Together (Parallax)
description:
NOTE: PLAY GAME IN FULLSCREEN

Pull Yourself Together is a 2D platformer game created for the Metroidvania Month 17 Jam!

It is currently a Work in Progress, and will be receiving vast improvements once voting on the game jam is done.

How To Play

Gather parts and piece yourself together, and explore the bug-infested caves around you. You start as a head, and need a body before you can attach limbs. Ammo for guns is acquired by mining crystals with a drill.

There is one map and then a boss fight.

Controls

MovementW A S DJumpSpacebarInteractEUse DrillRight Mouse ButtonShoot GunLeft Mouse ButtonCrouchLeft CTRLSprintLeft SHIFT

Things I still need to add:

-Background Design/Environment

- More SFX

-Tutorial Screens

- Gameplay Balance

- More Animations

Design, Art, Animation and Coding by

Christian Cassara: www.parallaxreality.com

Music by

Skittlegirl Sound: www.skittlegirlsound.com
